hadiths.text: Narrated Samurah ibn Jundub: The Prophet (ﷺ) named our cavalry "the Cavalry of Allah," when we were struck with panic, and when panic overtook us, the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) commanded us to be united, to have patience and perseverance; and to be so when we fought

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي النِّدَاءِ عِنْدَ النَّفِيرِ يَا خَيْلَ اللَّهِ ارْكَبِي
chapter.eng-name: Regarding Calling Out During The Time Of Departure (For Battle): "O Allah's Horseman! Ride"
